item.title: The Talos Principle: Reawakened launches April 10
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/the-talos-principle-reawakened-launches-april-10

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

PC demo now available.

The Talos Principle: Reawakened, the “radically overhauled reawakening” of the philosophical puzzle game The Talos Principle, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on April 10, publisher Devolver Digital and developer Croteam announced. A demo is available now for PC via Steam as part of Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Edition.

Here is an overview of the game and demo, via Devolver Digital:

About the Game

About

Step back into a world of thought-provoking puzzles, philosophical intrigue, and breathtaking visuals with The Talos Principle: Reawakened. This definitive edition revisits the groundbreaking narrative of The Talos Principle, immersing players in an expanded and remastered journey through the world of the Simulation.

The Talos Principle: Reawakened introduces new content, enhanced gameplay, and a gorgeously upgraded presentation. Relive the critically acclaimed expansion Road to Gehenna and dive into an all-new chapter, In the Beginning. Discover the story of Alexandra Drennan as she faces profound existential questions while orchestrating the Simulation’s first critical test, challenging players to think deeply about the human condition.

Key Features

  • Unparalleled Visuals and Quality-of-Life Improvements – Rebuilt with Unreal Engine 5, the Simulation world you remember is now more immersive and detailed than ever before. Enhanced lighting, textures, and environmental design breathe new life into every corner of the game, alongside modernized quality-of-life updates that maintain the vision of the original classic.
  • Expanded Content with a Bold New Chapter – Revisit the acclaimed expansion, Road to Gehenna, and experience the thrilling new chapter, In the Beginning. This fresh addition explores the origins of the Simulation and the challenges of its first test, adding new layers to the game’s philosophical and narrative depth.
  • Innovative Puzzle Editor for the Creative Community – For creators and problem-solvers, The Talos Principle: Reawakened includes a versatile Puzzle Editor. This robust tool empowers the talented modding community to build unique worlds and challenges, fostering creativity and ensuring a thriving future for The Talos Principle.

About the Demo

The Talos Principle: Reawakened demo invites you to explore a breathtaking medieval environment filled with intricate puzzles and thought-provoking challenges.

Experience a carefully curated taste of puzzles from the full game, including key mechanics like laser connectors, force-field jammers, and pressure plates.

Solving puzzles is only the beginning. Try your hand at using the fully-featured Puzzle Editor. This tool allows you to build unique worlds and challenges, fosters creativity, and empowers our modding community to ensure a thriving future for The Talos Principle.

The Talos Principle: Reawakened demo offers a glimpse into the vast, philosophical journey that awaits you. Play it now and see why critics and players hail The Talos Principle as one of the best puzzle adventures ever.

item.title: River Towns launches March 24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/river-towns-launches-march-24

  • PC

Tetris-like city puzzle game dated.

Tetris-like city puzzle game River Towns will launch for PC via Steam on March 24, publishers Metaroot and Stray Fawn Publishing, and developer Frogsong Studios announced. A demo is available now as part of Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Edition.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

In River Towns, you place differently shaped buildings and make them fit into a limited area. Combine unique districts into a vibrant living city and help restore our River Towns.

Puzzle a River Town

Each of the three districts has its own set of shapes which are shuffled randomly. This makes every game you play a new and unique puzzle to solve. The different district’s unique and vibrant architecture combines into beautiful little towns along the river. As the town grows, more townspeople move in and bring life back into this old and broken world.

Earn Points

Buildings also belong to differently colored districts which score bonus points when connected into large clusters. Getting a good score on each level awards stars, which restores the world and also unlocks more levels.

Each Level is Different

The beginning of each town starts with you restoring this part of the dried up river and surrounding it with buildings. Throughout the game you encounter other objectives, such as gold to collect, trees to regrow and old monuments to rebuild. This turns the difficulty and possibility of collecting points completely upside down.

Progression

With every city you piece together, the world becomes a little more verdant. When you complete a level, you will receive a gold, silver or bronze marker, depending on your score. Once you have enough points, you can move on to the next world.

Key Features

  • Piece together beautiful towns along the river.
  • Earn points in various ways.
  • Enjoy many unique levels with ever-changing mechanics.
  • Restore nature and rebuild the monuments of the old, broken world.
  • Share your towns with photo mode.
  • Compare your score with your friends.

item.title: Infinity Nikki version 1.3 update ‘Eerie Season’ launches February 26
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/infinity-nikki-version-1-3-update-eerie-season-launches-february-26

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

New events, mysteries, and a new dungeon.

Infinity Nikki‘s version 1.3 update, “Eerie Season,” will launch on February 26, publisher Infold Games and developer Papergame announced. It will add new events, mysteries, and a new dungeon.

Here is an overview of the update, via Infold Games:

This latest update will immerse players in a hauntingly beautiful atmosphere filled with gothic intrigue, supernatural phenomena, and mysterious new challenges.

Set to launch on February 26 and running until March 25, “Eerie Season” invites players to explore the forsaken Queen’s Palace Ruins, uncovering secrets hidden in the echoes of a cursed song, and assist the legendary creature, Bullquet, in a heartwarming side event.

In “The Queen’s Lament,” mysterious singing voices have begun resonating from the ruins of Queen Philomia’s once-grand palace, drawing whispers of a lingering curse. As night falls, the eerie melodies drift through the deserted corridors, instilling fear in the residents of Florawish. Determined to unveil the truth, Nikki and Momo embark on an expedition into the Queen’s Palace Ruins, where long-buried secrets await discovery.

Once players complete “The Queen’s Lament” event, the “Queen’s Palace Ruins: Inner Court” dungeon will unlock, offering a new, spine-chilling challenge. With its eerie, mysterious aesthetic and supernatural ambiance, this dungeon will provide an unforgettable experience unlike any before.

After clearing the “Queen’s Palace Ruins: Inner Court,” players can visit the high tower in the Queen’s Palace Ruins at night and interact with the piano stool by Ms. Glove to play the piano by her side.

Additionally, the gentle but legendary Bullquet has fallen into an unusual torpor, causing concern in the Wondrous Life Association. To uncover the cause, they have enlisted a special helper—Nikki! Sign up to help and join the mission to restore Bullquet’s vitality in this wholesome and charming event.

During the “Eerie Season,” a total of 15 “Revelation Crystals” and the new outfit “Dream Chaser” can be obtained for free. Additionally, the Heartfelt Gifts Store will offer three more free outfits, bringing the total to nine free outfits across three versions to continue Infold’s commitment to continuously optimize the game and ensure player satisfaction.

Infinity Nikki continues to expand its immersive world with rich storytelling, engaging events, and stunning visuals. Players can experience the gothic beauty of Eerie Season and embark on an unforgettable supernatural adventure when the update launches on February 26.

Infinity Nikki is available now for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play.
